structure.unit: STATE LIBRARIES -- LIBRARIANS -- STATE ARCHIVES AND RECORDS

law.text: The department is authorized to make continuing surveys of government records and records management and disposal practices and to obtain reports thereon from state and local agencies; to promote, in cooperation with the various state and local agencies, improved records management practices and controls in such agencies, including the central storage or disposition of records not needed by such agencies for their current use; and to report to the Governor semiannually. The department shall submit a biennial report to the General Assembly.
law.history: Amended 1970 Ky. Acts ch. 92, sec. 36. -- Created 1958 Ky. Acts ch. 49, sec. 7.
